name: Chaos Gift: Acid Spray
description: Unknown forces have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can create sprays of acid.  Activate to focus your power, draining fatigue.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.  Use it from your inventory.

name: Raptor Gift: Clarity of Blood
description: Unknown forces have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy that can protect against parasites and the Mycus.  Activate to focus your power, draining fatigue.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.  Use it from your inventory.

name: Prime Gift: Healing
description: Unknown forces have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can heal the body.  Activate to focus your power, draining fatigue.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.  Use it from your inventory.

name: Fey Gift: Overgrowth
description: Unknown forces have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can cause plants to spring up from nothingness.  Activate to focus your power, draining fatigue.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.  Use it from your inventory.

name: Arcana: Summon Shadow Snake
//: Only zero points because it's a profession-specific spell, fatigue cost is calculated as though it has a cost of 4.
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can summon a shadow snake.  Activate to focus your power, draining fatigue.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.  Use it from your inventory.

name: Arcana: Summon Shadow
//: Only zero points because it's a profession-specific spell, fatigue cost is calculated as though it has a cost of 5.
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can summon a shadow.  Activate to focus your power, draining fatigue.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.  Use it from your inventory.

name: Arcana: Summon Yugg
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can summon a yugg.  Activate to focus your power, draining fatigue.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.  Use it from your inventory.

name: Sanguine Mark: Summon Jabberwock
description: Inhuman power has granted you the ability to summon a jabberwock.  (( Remember to bind the "spellcasting" key! ))
